text.section: Promptly after a petition for adoption is filed under this Part III of this subtitle, a juvenile court shall issue a show-cause order that requires the party to whom issued to respond as required under the Maryland Rules.

On issuance of a show-cause order as to adoption of a child under this section, a petitioner shall serve the order on:
each of the child's living parents who has not consented to the adoption;
each living parent's last attorney of record in the CINA case; and
the child's last attorney of record in the CINA case.

Service under this section shall be:
on a parent, by:
first-class mail; and
on an attorney, by:
personal service; or
certified mail, return receipt requested.
Service on a parent under this section shall be attempted as provided in § 5-316(d), (e), and (f) of this subtitle.
